traceability.evidence: The xmlFormatter implementation in src/xml-formatter.js is annotated with @story prompts/009.0-DEV-XML-OUTPUT.md and covers declaration, root, packages, summary, thresholds, and error sections. The CLI (bin/dry-aged-deps.js) accepts `--format=xml`, suppresses non-XML output, and routes to xmlFormatter. All 206 Vitest tests pass (including test/xml-formatter.test.js, test/xml-formatter.*.test.js, test/cli.format-xml.test.js, and test/cli.format-xml.error.test.js). Coverage for xml-formatter.js and xml-formatter-utils.js is 100%, and XML output tests verify well-formedness, complete data, summary section, exit codes (1 for updates, 2 for errors), and no stderr noise.
traceability.notes: Every acceptance criterion from prompts/009.0-DEV-XML-OUTPUT.md has been implemented and is verified by unit and end-to-end tests. The CLI help lists XML as a valid format, errors are rendered in XML, and exit codes behave correctly. XML output schema matches the specification.
